name.description: The name of the location for which the weather information is provided.

temp_c.description: The current temperature at the specified location in celsius.

temp_f.description: The current temperature at the specified location in fahrenheit.

local_time.description: The local time of the specified location

is_day.description: The day or night time of the specified location

humidity.description: The current humidity percentage at the specified location.

condition.description: The condition of the weather at the specified location

condition_img.description: The condition image of the weather at the specified location

wind_mph.description: The wind speed at the specified location in miles per hour

wind_kph.description: The wind speed at the specified location in kilometer per hour

isOldData.description: A flag for if the data is freshly called from the api or if it's the old data from the data

404.description: Weather information not found for the specified location
